sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUPERPARTIENT proportion, or Ratio, is when the greater term contains the leſs term once, and leaves ſome number greater than 1 remaining. As the ratio of 3 to 5, which is equal to that of 1 to 1 2/3; ; of 7 to 10, which is equal to that of 1 to 1 3/7, &c.
